snippet.title: Sydney terror raids: Plane bomb plot 'completely disrupted', police say
snippet.content: A terror plot to place an improvised explosive device [IED] on an Etihad flight out of Sydney last month has been has been "completely disrupted", police have said. Australian Federal Police deputy commissioner Michael Phelan said two men charged last night with terror offences were also planning to detonate a hydrogen sulphide, or "rotten egg gas" bomb. More to come.
